verbs.description: [ARG0: pet owners] [V: warned] [ARG1: about potentially deadly disease spread by fleas] county public health officials reported friday that a woman in north park contracted a rare but potentially deadly form of typhus and urged pet owners who let their animals outside to protect their pets and themselves from fleas pet california department of public health typhus pathogenic bacteria murine typhus
